title: A small house on hilly land view for sale
details:
30 perches hilly land and situated behind the road
No noisy and smoke
15 coconut trees and4 mango treehouse bring shades
2.0 km to Unawatuna beach
400.0 meter t Unawatuna railway station
5.0 km to Galle town
2.0 km to southern highway entrance
An ideal for a tourist villa

House inspection only prior appointment with our agent.
